comment 1: Perfect set, looks clean, does the trick and the price is fair! Bought 2 sets, one grey and one black, highly recommend. - Coralie Salvail
comment 2: Easy to assemble, easy to store, good quality, looks good, and easy to use. I recommend - Tiago S.
comment 4: I like the 2 in 1 and the little stand for the plunger. I’m not positive that the plunger will actually work, it seems a bit flimsy to me, but I haven’t had to use it yet. The brush works just fine. - Alyssa
